 1889: %% make_relup: Check some abnormal cases.
 1890: abnormal_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1891:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1892: 
 1893:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest0,Config),
 1894:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1895: 
 1896:     %% Check wrong app vsn
 1897:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1898:     P = [fname([DataDir, d_bad_app_vsn, lib, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1899: 	 fname([DataDir, d_bad_app_vsn, lib, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1900: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1901: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1902: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1903: 
 1904:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1905: 
 1906:     error = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1907: 				[{path, P}]),
 1908:     R0 = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1909: 			     [silent, {path, P}]),
 1910:     {error,systools_make,
 1911:      [{error_reading,{db,{no_valid_version,
 1912: 			  {{"should be","2.1"},
 1913: 			   {"found file", _, "2.0"}}}}}]} = R0,
 1914:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1915:     ok.
 1916: 
 1917: 
 1918: %% make_relup: Check relup cannot be created is sasl is not in rel file.
 1919: no_sasl_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1920:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1921:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
 1922:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1923: 
 1924:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1925:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 1926:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 1927: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1928: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1929: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1930: 
 1931:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 1932: 
 1933:     error = systools:make_relup(Name2, [Name1], [Name1], [{path, P}]),
 1934:     R1 = systools:make_relup(Name2, [Name1], [Name1],[silent, {path, P}]),
 1935:     {error,systools_relup,{missing_sasl,_}} = R1,
 1936: 
 1937:     error = systools:make_relup(Name1, [Name2], [Name2], [{path, P}]),
 1938:     R2 = systools:make_relup(Name1, [Name2], [Name2],[silent, {path, P}]),
 1939:     {error,systools_relup,{missing_sasl,_}} = R2,
 1940: 
 1941:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1942:     ok.
 1943: 
 1944: 
 1945: %% make_relup: Check that application start type is used in relup
 1946: app_start_type_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1947:     %% This might fail if some applications are not available, if so
 1948:     %% skip the test case.
 1949:     try create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config) of
 1950: 	{Dir2,Name2} ->
 1951: 	    app_start_type_relup(Dir2,Name2,Config)
 1952:     catch throw:{error,Reason} ->
 1953: 	    {skip,Reason}
 1954:     end.
 1955: 
 1956: app_start_type_relup(Dir2,Name2,Config) ->
 1957:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
 1958:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config),
 1959: 
 1960:     Release1 = filename:join(Dir1,Name1),
 1961:     Release2 = filename:join(Dir2,Name2),
 1962: 
 1963:     {ok, Release2Relup, systools_relup, []} = systools:make_relup(Release2, [Release1], [Release1], [{outdir, PrivDir}, silent]),
 1964:     {"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE2",
 1965:      [{"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE1",[], UpInstructions}],
 1966:      [{"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE1",[], DownInstructions}]} = Release2Relup,
 1967:     %% test_server:format("Up: ~p",[UpInstructions]),
 1968:     %% test_server:format("Dn: ~p",[DownInstructions]),
 1969:     [{load_object_code, {mnesia, _, _}},
 1970:      {load_object_code, {runtime_tools, _, _}},
 1971:      {load_object_code, {snmp, _, _}},
 1972:      {load_object_code, {xmerl, _, _}},
 1973:      point_of_no_return
 1974:      | UpInstructionsT] = UpInstructions,
 1975:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,start,[mnesia,permanent]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1976:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,start,[runtime_tools,transient]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1977:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,load,[snmp]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1978:     false = lists:any(fun({apply,{application,_,[xmerl|_]}}) -> true; (_) -> false end, UpInstructionsT),
 1979:     [point_of_no_return | DownInstructionsT] = DownInstructions,
 1980:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[mnesia]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1981:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[runtime_tools]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1982:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[snmp]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1983:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[xmerl]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1984:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[mnesia]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1985:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[runtime_tools]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1986:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[snmp]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1987:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[xmerl]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1988:     ok.
 1989: 
 1990: 
 1991: %% make_relup: Check that regexp can be used in .appup for UpFromVsn
 1992: %% and DownToVsn.
 1993: regexp_relup(Config) ->
 1994:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1995: 
 1996:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest_small,Config),
 1997:     {_LatestDir0,LatestName0} = create_script(latest_small0,Config),
 1998:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest_small2,Config),
 1999: 
 2000:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2001:     P = [fname([DataDir, d_regexp_appup, lib, '*', ebin]),
 2002: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2003: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2004: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2005: 
 2006:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2007: 
 2008:     %% Upgrade fe 2.1 -> 3.1, and downgrade 2.1 -> 3.1
 2009:     %% Shall match the first entry if fe-3.1 appup.
 2010:     {ok, _, _, []} =
 2011: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName0], [LatestName0],
 2012: 			    [{path, P}, silent]),
 2013:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}], [{fe, "2.1"}]),
 2014: 
 2015:     %% Upgrade fe 2.1.1 -> 3.1
 2016:     %% Shall match the second entry in fe-3.1 appup. Have added a
 2017:     %% restart_emulator instruction there to distinguish it from
 2018:     %% the first entry...
 2019:     {ok, _, _, []} =
 2020: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [], [{path, P}, silent]),
 2021:     ok = check_relup_up_only([{fe, "3.1"}]),
 2022:     ok = check_restart_emulator_up_only(),
 2023: 
 2024:     %% Attempt downgrade fe 3.1 -> 2.1.1
 2025:     %% Shall not match any entry!!
 2026:     {error,systools_relup,{no_relup,_,_,_}} =
 2027: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [], [LatestName1], [{path, P}, silent]),
 2028: 
 2029:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2030: 
 2031:     ok.
 2032: 
 2033: %% make_relup: Replace an application dependency with another
 2034: %%   The key part here is that the new application should be
 2035: %%   started before the old one is stopped.
 2036: replace_app_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2037:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2038: 
 2039:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(replace_app0,Config),
 2040:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(replace_app1,Config),
 2041: 
 2042:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2043:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_replace_app, lib])],
 2044:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2045: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2046: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2047: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2048: 
 2049:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2050:     
 2051:     ok = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 2052: 			     [{path, P}]),
 2053: 
 2054:     check_start_stop_order([{start,gh},{stop,fe}], [{start,fe},{stop,gh}]),
 2055: 
 2056:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2057:     ok.
 2058: 
 2059: 
 2060: check_start_stop_order(UpOrder, DownOrder) ->
 2061: 
 2062:     {ok, [{_V0, [{V1, [], Up}],
 2063:                 [{V1, [], Down}]
 2064:             }]} = file:consult(relup),
 2065: 
 2066:     GetAppStartStop = fun(Instr) ->
 2067:         [{Action,App} || {apply,{application,Action,[App|_]}} <- Instr,
 2068:                 lists:member(Action,[start,stop])]
 2069:     end,
 2070: 
 2071:     case GetAppStartStop(Up) of
 2072:         UpOrder -> ok;
 2073:         ActualUpOrder ->
 2074:           ct:fail("Incorrect upgrade order.~nExpected: ~p~nGot:~p",
 2075:                   [UpOrder,ActualUpOrder])
 2076:     end,
 2077: 
 2078:     case GetAppStartStop(Down) of
 2079:         DownOrder -> ok;
 2080:         ActualDownOrder ->
 2081:           ct:fail("Incorrect down order.~nExpected: ~p~nGot:~p",
 2082:                   [DownOrder,ActualDownOrder])
 2083:     end,
 2084: 
 2085:     ok.
 2086: 
 2087: %% make_hybrid_boot: Normal case.
 2088: %% For upgrade of erts - create a boot file which is a hybrid between
 2089: %% old and new release - i.e. starts erts, kernel, stdlib, sasl from
 2090: %% new release, all other apps from old release.
 2091: normal_hybrid(Config) ->
 2092:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2093:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2094:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 2095: 
 2096:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2097:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2098:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2099: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2100: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2101: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2102: 
 2103:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2104: 
 2105:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2106:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2107:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2108:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2109: 
 2110:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2111: 
 2112:     {ok,Hybrid} = systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,
 2113:                                                  [dummy,args]),
 2114: 
 2115:     {script,{"Test release","tmp_vsn"},Script} = binary_to_term(Hybrid),
 2116:     ct:log("~p.~n",[Script]),
 2117: 
 2118:     %% Check that all paths to base apps are replaced by paths from BaseLib
 2119:     Boot1Str = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Boot1)]),
 2120:     Boot2Str = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Boot2)]),
 2121:     HybridStr = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Hybrid)]),
 2122:     ReOpts = [global,{capture,first,list},unicode],
 2123:     {match,OldKernelMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2124:     {match,OldStdlibMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2125:     {match,OldSaslMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2126: 
 2127:     {match,NewKernelMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2128:     {match,NewStdlibMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2129:     {match,NewSaslMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2130: 
 2131:     {match,NewKernelMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2132:     {match,NewStdlibMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2133:     {match,NewSaslMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2134: 
 2135:     NewKernelN = length(NewKernelMatch),
 2136:     NewKernelN = length(OldKernelMatch),
 2137:     NewStdlibN = length(NewStdlibMatch),
 2138:     NewStdlibN = length(OldStdlibMatch),
 2139:     NewSaslN = length(NewSaslMatch),
 2140:     NewSaslN = length(OldSaslMatch),
 2141: 
 2142:     %% Check that kernelProcesses are taken from new boot script
 2143:     {script,_,Script2} = binary_to_term(Boot2),
 2144:     NewKernelProcs = [KP || KP={kernelProcess,_,_} <- Script2],
 2145:     NewKernelProcs = [KP || KP={kernelProcess,_,_} <- Script],
 2146: 
 2147:     %% Check that application load instruction has correct versions
 2148:     Apps = application:loaded_applications(),
 2149:     {_,_,KernelVsn} = lists:keyfind(kernel,1,Apps),
 2150:     {_,_,StdlibVsn} = lists:keyfind(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2151:     {_,_,SaslVsn} = lists:keyfind(sasl,1,Apps),
 2152: 
 2153:     [KernelInfo] = [I || {kernelProcess,application_controller,
 2154: 			  {application_controller,start,
 2155: 			   [{application,kernel,I}]}} <- Script],
 2156:     [StdlibInfo] = [I || {apply,
 2157: 			  {application,load,
 2158: 			   [{application,stdlib,I}]}} <- Script],
 2159:     [SaslInfo] = [I || {apply,
 2160: 			{application,load,
 2161: 			 [{application,sasl,I}]}} <- Script],
 2162: 
 2163:     {vsn,KernelVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,KernelInfo),
 2164:     {vsn,StdlibVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,StdlibInfo),
 2165:     {vsn,SaslVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,SaslInfo),
 2166: 
 2167:     %% Check that new_emulator_upgrade call is added
 2168:     [_,{apply,{release_handler,new_emulator_upgrade,[dummy,args]}}|_] =
 2169: 	lists:reverse(Script),
 2170: 
 2171:     %% Check that db-1.0 and fe-3.1 are used (i.e. vsns from old release)
 2172:     %% And that fe is in there (it exists in old rel but not in new)
 2173:     {match,DbMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"db-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2174:     {match,[_|_]=FeMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"fe-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2175:     true = lists:all(fun(["db-1.0"]) -> true;
 2176: 			(_)  -> false
 2177: 		     end,
 2178: 		     DbMatch),
 2179:     true = lists:all(fun(["fe-3.1"]) -> true;
 2180: 			(_)  -> false
 2181: 		     end,
 2182: 		     FeMatch),
 2183: 
 2184:     %% Check that script has same length as old script, plus one (the
 2185:     %% new_emulator_upgrade apply)
 2186:     {_,_,Old} = binary_to_term(Boot1),
 2187:     OldLength = length(Old),
 2188:     NewLength = length(Script),
 2189:     NewLength = OldLength + 1,
 2190: 
 2191:     ok.
 2192: 
 2193: %% make_hybrid_boot: No sasl in from-release.
 2194: %% Check that systools_make:make_hybrid_boot fails with a meaningful
 2195: %% error message if the FromBoot does not include the sasl
 2196: %% application.
 2197: hybrid_no_old_sasl(Config) ->
 2198:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2199:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
 2200:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 2201: 
 2202:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2203:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2204:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2205: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2206: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2207: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2208: 
 2209:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2210: 
 2211:     {ok, _ , [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
 2212: 	systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2213:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2214:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2215:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2216: 
 2217:     {error,{app_not_replaced,sasl}} =
 2218: 	systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,[dummy,args]),
 2219: 
 2220:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2221:     ok.
 2222: 
 2223: 
 2224: %% make_hybrid_boot: No sasl in to-release.
 2225: %% Check that systools_make:make_hybrid_boot fails with a meaningful
 2226: %% error message if the ToBoot does not include the sasl
 2227: %% application.
 2228: hybrid_no_new_sasl(Config) ->
 2229:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2230:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2231:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config),
 2232: 
 2233:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2234:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2235:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2236: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2237: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2238: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2239: 
 2240:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2241: 
 2242:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2243:     {ok, _ , [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
 2244: 	systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2245:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2246:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2247: 
 2248:     {error,{app_not_found,sasl}} =
 2249: 	systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,[dummy,args]),
 2250: 
 2251:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2252:     ok.
 2253: 
 2254: 
 2255: 
 2256: %% options: {outdir,Dir} option
 2257: otp_6226_outdir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2258:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2259:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2260: 
 2261:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest0,Config),
 2262:     {_LatestDir, LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2263: 
 2264:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2265:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 2266:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 2267: 	 fname([LibDir, 'db-1.0', ebin]),
 2268: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 2269: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2270: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2271: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2272: 
 2273:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2274: 
 2275: 
 2276:     %% Create an outdir1 directory
 2277:     ok = file:make_dir("outdir1"),
 2278: 
 2279:     %% ==== Now test systools:make_script ====
 2280:     %% a) badarg
 2281:     {'EXIT', {{badarg,[{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2282: 	(catch systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,outdir1},
 2283: 						 {path,P},silent])),
 2284: 
 2285:     %% b) absolute path
 2286:     Outdir1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "outdir1"),
 2287:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2288: 						  {path,P},silent]),
 2289:     Script1 = filename:join(Outdir1, LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2290:     Boot1 = filename:join(Outdir1, LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2291:     true = filelib:is_file(Script1),
 2292:     true = filelib:is_file(Boot1),
 2293:     ok = file:delete(Script1),
 2294:     ok = file:delete(Boot1),
 2295: 
 2296:     %% c) relative path
 2297:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2298: 						  {path,P},silent]),
 2299:     true = filelib:is_file(Script1),
 2300:     true = filelib:is_file(Boot1),
 2301:     ok = file:delete(Script1),
 2302:     ok = file:delete(Boot1),
 2303: 
 2304:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2305:     Outdir2 = filename:join(PrivDir, "outdir2"),
 2306:     Script2 = filename:join(Outdir2, LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2307:     {error,_,{open,Script2,_}} =
 2308: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2309: 
 2310:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2311:     {error,_,{open,_,_}} =
 2312: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2313: 
 2314:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2315:     ok = file:set_cwd(Outdir1),
 2316:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(filename:join(PrivDir, LatestName),
 2317: 				     [{outdir,"."},{path,P},silent]),
 2318:     true = filelib:is_file(LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2319:     true = filelib:is_file(LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2320:     ok = file:delete(LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2321:     ok = file:delete(LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2322:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2323: 
 2324:     %% ==== Now test systools:make_tar =====
 2325:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path,P},silent]),
 2326:     %% a) badarg
 2327:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2328:     	(catch systools:make_tar(LatestName,[{outdir,outdir1},{path,P},silent])),
 2329: 
 2330:     %% b) absolute path
 2331:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2332: 					       {path,P},silent]),
 2333:     Tar1 = filename:join(Outdir1,LatestName++".tar.gz"),
 2334:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2335:     ok = file:delete(Tar1),
 2336: 
 2337:     %% c) relative path
 2338:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2339: 					       {path,P},silent]),
 2340:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2341:     ok = file:delete(Tar1),
 2342: 
 2343:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2344:     Tar2 = filename:join(Outdir2,LatestName++".tar.gz"),
 2345:     {error,_,{tar_error,{open,Tar2,{Tar2,enoent}}}} =
 2346: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2347: 
 2348:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2349:     {error,_,{tar_error,{open,_,_}}} =
 2350: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2351: 
 2352:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2353:     ok = file:set_cwd(Outdir1),
 2354:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(filename:join(PrivDir, LatestName),
 2355: 				  [{outdir,"."},{path,P},silent]),
 2356:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2357:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2358: 
 2359:     %% ===== Now test systools:make_relup =====
 2360:     %% a) badarg
 2361:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2362:     	(catch systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2363:     				   [{outdir,outdir1}, 
 2364: 				    {path,P},silent])),
 2365: 
 2366:     %% b) absolute path
 2367:     Relup = filename:join(Outdir1, "relup"),
 2368:     {ok,_,_,[]} = systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2369: 				      [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2370: 				       {path,P},silent]),
 2371:     true = filelib:is_file(Relup),
 2372:     ok = file:delete(Relup),
 2373: 
 2374:     %% c) relative path
 2375:     {ok,_,_,[]} = systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2376: 				      [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2377: 				       {path,P},silent]),
 2378:     true = filelib:is_file(Relup),
 2379:     ok = file:delete(Relup),
 2380: 
 2381:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2382:     {error,_,{file_problem,{"relup",{open,enoent}}}} =
 2383: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2384: 			    [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2385: 
 2386:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2387:     {error,_,{file_problem,{"relup",{open,enoent}}}} =
 2388: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2389: 			    [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2390: 
 2391:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2392:     %% -- not necessary to test since relup by default is placed in
 2393:     %%    cwd, not in the same directory as the .rel file --
 2394: 
 2395:     %% Change back to previous working directory
 2396:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2397:     ok.
 2398: 
 2399: 
 2400: %% Test that all default values can be used as values in the .app file
 2401: app_file_defaults(Config) ->
 2402:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
 2403:     Name = app1,
 2404:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2405:     Vsn = "1.0",
 2406:     AppSpec = app_spec(Name,#{vsn=>"1.0"}),
 2407:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(PrivDir,NameStr ++ ".app"),
 2408: 			 io_lib:format("~p.~n",[AppSpec])),
 2409:     {ok,_} = systools_make:read_application(NameStr,Vsn,[PrivDir],[]),
 2410:     ok.
 2411: 
 2412: app_spec(Name,New) ->
 2413:     {application,Name,app_spec(New)}.
 2414: 
 2415: app_spec(New) ->
 2416:     Default = #{description => "",
 2417: 		id => "",
 2418: 		vsn => "",
 2419: 		modules => [],
 2420: 		maxP => infinity,
 2421: 		maxT => infinity,
 2422: 		registered => [],
 2423: 		included_applications => [],
 2424: 		applications => [],
 2425: 		env => [],
 2426: 		mod => [],
 2427: 		start_phases => undefined,
 2428: 		runtime_dependencies => []},
 2429:     maps:to_list(maps:merge(Default,New)).
 2430: 
 2431: %%%%%%
 2432: %%%%%% Utilities
 2433: %%%%%%
 2434: 
 2435: check_script_path(RelName) ->
 2436:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2437:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2438:     case lists:keysearch(path, 1, ListOfThings) of
 2439: 	{value, {path, [$$,$R,$O,$O,$T | _]}} -> %"$ROOT..."
 2440: 	    false;
 2441: 	_ -> ok
 2442:     end.
 2443: 
 2444: check_var_script_file(VarDirs, NoExistDirs, RelName) ->
 2445:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2446:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2447:     AllPaths = lists:append(lists:map(fun({path, P}) -> P;
 2448: 					 (_)         -> []
 2449: 				      end,
 2450: 				      ListOfThings)),
 2451:     case lists:filter(fun(VarDir) -> lists:member(VarDir, AllPaths) end,
 2452: 		      VarDirs) of
 2453: 	VarDirs ->
 2454: 	    ok;
 2455: 	_ ->
 2456: 	    ct:fail("All variable dirs not in generated script")
 2457:     end,
 2458:     case lists:filter(fun(NoExistDir) -> lists:member(NoExistDir, AllPaths) end,
 2459: 		      NoExistDirs) of
 2460: 	[] ->
 2461: 	    ok;
 2462: 	_ ->
 2463: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected dirs in generated script")
 2464:     end.
 2465: 
 2466: check_include_script(RelName, ExpectedLoad, ExpectedStart) ->
 2467:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2468:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2469: 
 2470:     %% Check that the applications are loaded in given order !
 2471:     ActualLoad = 
 2472: 	[App || {apply,{application,load,[{application,App,_}]}} <- ListOfThings,
 2473: 		App=/=kernel,
 2474: 		App=/=stdlib],
 2475: 
 2476:     if ActualLoad =:= ExpectedLoad -> ok;
 2477:        true -> ct:fail({bad_load_order, ActualLoad, ExpectedLoad})
 2478:     end,
 2479: 
 2480:     %% Check that applications are started in given order !
 2481:     ActualStart =
 2482: 	[App || {apply,{application,start_boot,[App|_]}} <- ListOfThings,
 2483: 		App =/= kernel,
 2484: 		App =/= stdlib],
 2485: 
 2486:     if ActualStart =:= ExpectedStart -> ok;
 2487:        true -> ct:fail({bad_start_order, ActualStart,ExpectedStart})
 2488:     end,
 2489: 
 2490:     ok.
 2491: 
 2492: read_script_file(RelName) ->
 2493:     file:consult(RelName ++ ".script").
 2494: 
 2495: check_var_tar(Variable, RelName) ->
 2496:     Expected = tar_name(Variable),
 2497:     case check_tar(Expected,RelName) of
 2498: 	ok ->
 2499: 	    ok;
 2500: 	{error, {erroneous_tar_file, _, missing, _}} ->
 2501: 	    {error, {not_generated, Expected}}
 2502:     end.
 2503: 
 2504: exists_tar_file(Name) ->
 2505:     File = tar_name(Name),
 2506:     case filelib:is_regular(File) of
 2507: 	true ->
 2508: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
 2509: 	    true;
 2510: 	_ ->
 2511: 	    false
 2512:     end.
 2513: 
 2514: %% Take a snap of the generated tar file and check if a certain
 2515: %% file is included.
 2516: %% This ensures at least that the tar file is generated.
 2517: check_tar(File, RelName) ->
 2518:     TarContents = tar_contents(RelName),
 2519:     case lists:member(File,TarContents) of
 2520: 	true -> ok;
 2521: 	_    -> {error, {erroneous_tar_file, tar_name(RelName), missing, File}}
 2522:     end.
 2523: 
 2524: %% Check that the given files exist in the tar file, and that they are
 2525: %% not symlinks
 2526: check_tar_regular(PrivDir, Files, RelName) ->
 2527:     TmpDir = fname(PrivDir,tmp),
 2528:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir),
 2529:     ok = erl_tar:extract(tar_name(RelName),
 2530: 			 [{files,Files},{cwd,TmpDir},compressed]),
 2531:     R = lists:foldl(fun(File,Acc) ->
 2532: 			    case file:read_link_info(fname(TmpDir,File)) of 
 2533: 				{ok,#file_info{type=regular}} ->
 2534: 				    Acc;
 2535: 				{ok,#file_info{type=Other}} ->
 2536: 				    [{File,Other}|Acc];
 2537: 				_ ->
 2538: 				    [{File,missing}|Acc]
 2539: 			    end
 2540: 		    end,
 2541: 		    [],
 2542: 		    Files),
 2543:     delete_tree(TmpDir),
 2544:     case R of
 2545: 	[] ->
 2546: 	    ok;
 2547: 	NotThere ->
 2548: 	    {error,{erroneous_tar_file,tar_name(RelName),NotThere}}
 2549:     end.
 2550: 
 2551: delete_tree(Dir) ->
 2552:     case filelib:is_dir(Dir) of
 2553: 	true ->
 2554: 	    {ok,Files} = file:list_dir(Dir),
 2555: 	    lists:foreach(fun(File) -> delete_tree(filename:join(Dir,File)) end, 
 2556: 			  Files),
 2557: 	    file:del_dir(Dir);
 2558: 	false ->
 2559: 	    ok = file:delete(Dir)
 2560:     end.
 2561: 
 2562: tar_contents(Name) ->
 2563:     {ok, Cont} = erl_tar:table(tar_name(Name), [compressed]),
 2564:     Cont.
 2565: 
 2566: tar_name(Name) ->
 2567:     Name ++ ".tar.gz".
 2568: 
 2569: create_script(latest,Config) ->
 2570:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2571:     do_create_script(latest,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2572: create_script(latest_no_mod_vsn,Config) ->
 2573:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"3.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2574:     do_create_script(latest_no_mod_vsn,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2575: create_script(latest0,Config) ->
 2576:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2577:     do_create_script(latest0,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2578: create_script(latest0_current_erts,Config) ->
 2579:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2580:     do_create_script(latest0_current_erts,Config,current,Apps);
 2581: create_script(latest1,Config) ->
 2582:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2583:     do_create_script(latest1,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2584: create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config) ->
 2585:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{stdlib,"1.0"},{db,"1.0"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2586:     do_create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2587: create_script(latest2,Config) ->
 2588:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"2.1"}],
 2589:     do_create_script(latest2,Config,"4.3",Apps);
 2590: create_script(latest_small,Config) ->
 2591:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"3.1"}],
 2592:     do_create_script(latest_small,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2593: create_script(latest_small0,Config) ->		%Differs in fe vsn
 2594:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"2.1"}],
 2595:     do_create_script(latest_small0,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2596: create_script(latest_small1,Config) ->
 2597:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"500.18.7"}],
 2598:     do_create_script(latest_small1,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2599: create_script(latest_small2,Config) ->
 2600:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"2.1.1"}],
 2601:     do_create_script(latest_small2,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2602: create_script(latest_nokernel,Config) ->
 2603:     Apps = [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2604:     do_create_script(latest_nokernel,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2605: create_script(latest_kernel_start_type,Config) ->
 2606:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0",load},{stdlib,"1.0"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2607:     do_create_script(latest_kernel_start_type,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2608: create_script(latest_stdlib_start_type,Config) ->
 2609:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{stdlib,"1.0",load},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2610:     do_create_script(latest_stdlib_start_type,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2611: create_script(latest_no_stdlib,Config) ->
 2612:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2613:     do_create_script(latest_no_stdlib,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2614: create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config) ->
 2615:     Apps = core_apps(current),
 2616:     do_create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config,current,Apps);
 2617: create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config) ->
 2618:     OtherApps = [{mnesia,current,permanent},
 2619: 		 {runtime_tools,current,transient},
 2620: 		 {snmp,current,load},
 2621: 		 {xmerl,current,none}],
 2622:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ OtherApps,
 2623:     do_create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config,current,Apps);
 2624: create_script(latest_t21, Config) ->
 2625:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{t21, "1.0"}],
 2626:     do_create_script(latest_t21, Config, "4.4", Apps);
 2627: create_script(latest_t22, Config) ->
 2628:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{t22, "1.0"}],
 2629:     do_create_script(latest_t22, Config, "4.4", Apps);
 2630: create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config) ->
 2631:     Apps = [{kernel,current},{stdlib,current},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2632:     do_create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config,current,Apps);
 2633: create_script(current_all,Config) ->
 2634:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"}],
 2635:     do_create_script(current_all,Config,current,Apps);
 2636: create_script(current_all_future_erts,Config) ->
 2637:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2638:     do_create_script(current_all_future_erts,Config,"99.99",Apps);
 2639: create_script(current_all_future_sasl,Config) ->
 2640:     Apps = [{kernel,current},{stdlib,current},{sasl,"9.9"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2641:     do_create_script(current_all_future_sasl,Config,current,Apps);
 2642: create_script({unicode,RelVsn},Config) ->
 2643:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{ua,"1.0"}],
 2644:     do_create_script(unicode,RelVsn,Config,current,Apps);
 2645: create_script(duplicate_modules,Config) ->
 2646:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"},{app2,"1.0"}],
 2647:     do_create_script(duplicate_modules,Config,current,Apps);
 2648: create_script(replace_app0,Config) ->
 2649:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"1.1"},{gh,"1.0"}],
 2650:     do_create_script(repace_app0,Config,current,Apps);
 2651: create_script(replace_app1,Config) ->
 2652:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"2.1"}],
 2653:     do_create_script(repace_app1,Config,current,Apps);
 2654: create_script(optional_apps_missing,Config) ->
 2655:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"}],
 2656:     do_create_script(optional_apps_missing,Config,current,Apps);
 2657: create_script(optional_apps_all,Config) ->
 2658:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"},{app2,"1.0"}],
 2659:     do_create_script(optional_apps_all,Config,current,Apps).
 2660: 
 2661: do_create_script(Id,Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns) ->
 2662:     do_create_script(Id,string:to_upper(atom_to_list(Id)),Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns).
 2663: do_create_script(Id,RelVsn,Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns) ->
 2664:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2665:     Name = fname(PrivDir, Id),
 2666:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(Name++".rel",write),
 2667:     RelfileContent =
 2668: 	{release,{"Test release", RelVsn},
 2669: 	 {erts,erts_vsn(ErtsVsn)},
 2670: 	 app_vsns(AppVsns)},
 2671:     io:format(Fd,"~p.~n",[RelfileContent]),
 2672:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2673:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)}.
 2674: 
 2675: core_apps(Vsn) ->
 2676:     [{App,Vsn} || App <- [kernel,stdlib,sasl]].
 2677: 
 2678: app_vsns(AppVsns) ->
 2679:     [{App,app_vsn(App,Vsn)} || {App,Vsn} <- AppVsns] ++
 2680: 	[{App,app_vsn(App,Vsn),Type} || {App,Vsn,Type} <- AppVsns].
 2681: app_vsn(App,current) ->
 2682:     case application:load(App) of
 2683: 	Ok when Ok==ok; Ok=={error,{already_loaded,App}} ->
 2684: 	    {ok,Vsn} = application:get_key(App,vsn),
 2685: 	    Vsn;
 2686: 	Error ->
 2687: 	    throw(Error)
 2688:     end;
 2689: app_vsn(_App,Vsn) ->
 2690:     Vsn.
 2691: 
 2692: erts_vsn(current) -> erlang:system_info(version);
 2693: erts_vsn(Vsn) -> Vsn.
 2694: 
 2695: 
 2696: create_include_files(inc1, Config) ->
 2697:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2698:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc1),
 2699:     create_apps(PrivDir),
 2700: 
 2701:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2702:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2703:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2704: 
 2705:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2706: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2707: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2708: 	"  {t6, \"1.0\"}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2709: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, {t2, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2710: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2711:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2712:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2713: 
 2714: create_include_files(inc2, Config) ->
 2715:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2716:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc2),
 2717:     create_apps(PrivDir),
 2718: 
 2719:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2720:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2721:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2722: 
 2723:     %% t6 does not include t5 !
 2724:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2725: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2726: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2727: 	"  {t6, \"1.0\", [t4]}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2728: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, {t2, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2729: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2730:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2731:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2732:

 2792: create_include_files(inc6, Config) ->
 2793:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2794:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc6),
 2795:     create_apps(PrivDir),
 2796: 
 2797:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2798:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2799:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2800: 
 2801:     %% t3 does include non existing t2 !
 2802:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2803: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2804: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2805: 	"  {t6, \"1.0\"}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2806: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2807: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2808:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2809:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2810: 
 2811: create_include_files(inc7, Config) ->
 2812:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2813:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc7),
 2814:     create_apps(PrivDir),
 2815:     create_app(t7, PrivDir),
 2816: 
 2817:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2818:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2819:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2820: 
 2821:     %% t7 and t6 does include t5 !
 2822:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2823: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2824: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2825: 	"  {t7, \"1.0\"}, {t6, \"1.0\"}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2826: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, {t2, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2827: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2828:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2829:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2830: 
 2831: create_include_files(inc8, Config) ->

 2838:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2839: 
 2840:     %% t8 uses t9 and t10 includes t9 !
 2841:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2842: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2843: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"

 2848: create_include_files(inc9, Config) ->
 2849:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2850:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc9),
 2851:     create_circular_apps(PrivDir),
 2852: 
 2853:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2854:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2855:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2856: 
 2857:     %% t8 uses t9, t9 uses t10 and t10 includes t8 ==> circular !!
 2858:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2859: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2860: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2861: 	"  {t8, \"1.0\"}, {t9, \"1.0\"}, {t10, \"1.0\", [t8]}]}.\n",
 2862:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2863:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2864:

 2872:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2873: 
 2874:     %% t9 tries to include not specified (in .app file) application !
 2875:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2876: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2877: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"

 2960: 
 2961: create_apps(Dir) ->
 2962:     T1 = "{application, t1,\n"
 2963: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2964: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2965: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2966: 	"  {applications, [kernel, stdlib]},\n"
 2967: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2968:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't1.app'), list_to_binary(T1)),
 2969: 
 2970:     T2 = "{application, t2,\n"
 2971: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2972: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2973: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2974: 	"  {applications, [t1]},\n"
 2975: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2976:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't2.app'), list_to_binary(T2)),
 2977: 
 2978:     T3 = "{application, t3,\n"
 2979: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2980: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2981: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2982: 	"  {applications, []},\n"
 2983: 	"  {included_applications, [t2]},\n"
 2984: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2985:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't3.app'), list_to_binary(T3)),
 2986: 
 2987:     T4 = "{application, t4,\n"
 2988: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2989: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2990: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2991: 	"  {applications, [t3]},\n"
 2992: 	"  {included_applications, []},\n"
 2993: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2994:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't4.app'), list_to_binary(T4)),
 2995: 
 2996:     T5 = "{application, t5,\n"
 2997: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2998: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2999: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 3000: 	"  {applications, [t3]},\n"

 3002: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",

 3011: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 3012:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't6.app'), list_to_binary(T6)).

 3171: create_apps_duplicate_entry(Dir) ->
 3172:     T21 = "{application, t21,\n"
 3173:     " [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 3174:     "  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 3175:     "  {modules, []},\n"
 3176:     "  {applications, []},\n"
 3177:     "  {included_applications, []},\n"
 3178:     "  {registered, [test, test]}]}.\n",
 3179:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't21.app'), list_to_binary(T21)),
 3180:     T22 = "{application, t22,\n"
 3181:     " [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 3182:     "  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 3183:     "  {modules, []},\n"
 3184:     "  {applications, []},\n"
 3185:     "  {included_applications, []},\n"
 3186:     "  {registered, [test]}]}.\n",
 3187:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't22.app'), list_to_binary(T22)).
 3188: 
 3189: fname(N) ->
 3190:     filename:join(N).
 3191: 
 3192: fname(Dir, Basename) ->
 3193:     filename:join(Dir, Basename).
